scripts.dev: npm run build && node --trace-warnings -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register  dist/bot dotenv_config_path=.env.development dotenv_config_debug=true
scripts.start: npm run build && node -r tsconfig-paths/register dist/bot
scripts.upload-s3-vocab: aws s3api put-object --bucket tarkov-prime --key vocab --body support/transcribe_vocab.txt
scripts.create-vocab: aws transcribe create-vocabulary --vocabulary-name tarkov --vocabulary-file-uri s3://tarkov-prime/vocab --language-code en-US
scripts.update-vocab: npm run upload-s3-vocab && npm run delete-vocab && npm run create-vocab
scripts.deploy: npm run build && flyctl deploy --local-only --build-arg NODE_ENV=production
